description: This Java class defines a servlet filter 'RequestContextFilter' in a Spring Boot application. The filter extracts the 'X-User-Id' header from incoming HTTP requests and sets it into a RequestContext object for use during the request lifecycle, then clears the context after processing. It is annotated as a Spring component with highest precedence order.

classes.name: RequestContextFilter
classes.description: A servlet filter that captures the 'X-User-Id' header from HTTP requests and sets it in the RequestContext for downstream use, then clears it after processing.

methods.name: doFilterInternal
methods.description: Overrides the method to extract user ID from request headers, set the context, and ensure cleanup after filtering.
